content: buy this pattern as part of an ebook here 2 > **please note ** the graphs for this > pattern are free to view in on my > blog this ad-free downloadable pdf > enables me to be able to bring you > more free patterns in the future go to the free graphs here 3 **description ** get your halloween on with these fun and classic designs - a cat and bat these squares are great on their own as coasters or can be incorporated really well into a bag like the patchwork halloween bag 4 or even together as a scarf this pdf includes the print graph and written instructions images of the graphs are available on divinedebris com 5 the sample in the photos was made in diyarn by lion brand yarn 6 affiliate link you may sell all finished products made from this pattern however you may not share sell or distribute this pattern in any way in whole or in part i would greatly appreciate a link back to my shop or this pattern anytime you sell this item online gauge listed in pattern written in us crochet terms you may not use any of the photos from this listing or the ones contained in the pattern to sell your item you must take your own photos do not create a pattern based on my pattern copyright @ divine debris 2024 no part of this document may be reproduced or transmitted in any form by any means electronic mechanical photocopying or otherwise without prior written permission from the author sales of finished product are permitted but designer requests that you link back to pattern and credit divine debris with the original design under the creative commons attribution-share alike license if you have any questions comments or concerns please contact info@divinedebris com 1 https //www ravelry com/redeem/divine-debris code=halloweencatbat 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/patchwork-halloween-bag-ebook 3 https //divinedebris com/cat-and-bat-halloween-squares-free-crochet-patterns/ 4 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/patchwork-halloween-bag 5 https //divinedebris com/cat-and-bat-halloween-squares-free-crochet-patterns/ 6 https //shrsl com/4nh6d
